amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to transfer or release to the Republic of Yemen (or any entity within Yemen) a detainee who is or was held, detained, or otherwise in the custody of the Department of Defense on or after June 24, 2009, at the United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to transfer or release to the Republic of Yemen (or any entity within Yemen) a detainee who is or was held, detained, or otherwise in the custody of DOD on or after June 24, 2009, at the United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A035) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 179 (Roll no. 321).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walorski amendment (A035) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 179 (Roll no. 321).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mrs. Walorski.
